column1: Recommended by my dermatologist as antioxidant. Light cream, works well with serums and creams.
I use this in the morning as a soothing lightweight cream - it compliments the strong retinol I use at night. It's very healing
I have been using this product for years and absolutely love how it makes my skin look and feel.
This is a great first layer moisturizer. I have used it for several years
